statement:
cdlemg8.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg8.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg8.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemg8.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg8.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg8.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg10bALTN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H /\ F e. T ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` P ) .\/ ( F ` Q ) ) ./\ W ) = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) ) $.
